text.section: A seller may not fail to deposit, as required by this subtitle, money received under or in connection with a preneed burial contract.

section.section: A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine not exceeding $5,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or both.

If a corporation violates this section, each officer responsible for the violation is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine not exceeding $5,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or both.
